backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing subscription management with Stripe integration, user profiles, brand voice profiles, content generation requests, and tier-based feature access control (Free/Pro/Elite) with hardcoded Stripe price IDs and webhook handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: Stripe product setup with Pro/Elite tiers and end-to-end subscription flow testing with tier upgrades and feature unlocking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, subscription management, payment flows, content generation with tier gating, and Stripe setup pages with immediate cache invalidation after upgrades.
frontend/docs/STRIPE_SETUP.md: Step-by-step guide for creating Pro ($29/month) and Elite ($79/month) subscription products in Stripe dashboard, configuring webhooks, and testing checkout flow with hardcoded price IDs already in backend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system featuring warm coral-orange primary colors, custom chart colors, and both light and dark mode theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div for React mounting, titled 'Viral Growth Operating System'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, pricing, dashboard, subscription, content generator, payment success/failure, and Stripe setup, wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContentOutput.ts: Component displaying generated content sections (hooks, scripts, captions, hashtags, monetization angles, etc.) with tier-based feature gating showing upgrade prompts for locked features based on FeatureSet.
frontend/src/components/ContentScoreCard: Displays AI-powered content performance scores (hook strength, retention potential, monetization potential) with progress bars and color-coded ratings, plus a virality analysis explanation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with header navigation, mobile menu, login/logout functionality, and footer with legal links and social media icons.
Displays a legal notice alert explaining user rights to generated content, AI assistance limitations, and compliance responsibilities.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and email, blocking interaction until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/UpgradePrompt.ts: Card component that displays a locked feature message and prompts users to upgrade to Pro or Elite tier with a link to pricing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling identity changes and invalidating dependent queries when actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profile management, subscription queries, feature access checks, content generation requests, and Stripe/shopping cart operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, energetic color palette for light and dark modes, including primary coral-orange colors, chart colors, and sidebar theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/ContentGenerator.tsx: Content generation page with a form for users to input content strategy parameters (tone, audience, platform, niche, goal) and displays AI-generated content output with tier-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard displaying subscription status, tier-based features, and recent content requests with navigation to content generation and subscription management.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature grid showcasing AI content generation capabilities, and call-to-action buttons for authentication and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment cancellation page displaying failure message with options to retry payment or return to dashboard/pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page that invalidates subscription queries to refresh tier data and provides navigation to dashboard or content generation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page displaying three subscription tiers (Free, Pro, Elite) with feature comparisons and Stripe checkout integration for paid tier upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only page for configuring Stripe payment integration, allowing administrators to set secret keys and allowed countries with validation and status display.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionManagemen: User subscription management page displaying current tier (Free/Pro/Elite), status, and billing controls with links to Stripe customer portal and upgrade options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, typography, container settings, animations, and design tokens for the UI system.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the AI-powered SaaS platform architecture with tiered subscription model (Free/Pro/Elite), content generation features, payment integration, and copyright compliance requirements.
